resources.string: This is a wonderful app for pregnant ladies to stay fit. This doesnâ€™t require any equipment, you can stay fit without going outside. A lot of yoga exercises with down-clock timer are there to practice your daily activities. Some generous tips and advices are there too. Then there is an option to check your BMI. It has a reminder option to maintain your activities. Tips and advices will be uploaded occasionally to keep you updated. Thank you!
